content: You can then use these special Crafting Materials to upgrade them at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove within Black Wind Mountain. Each upgrade will provide a sizeable buff to your healing potential and the unique effect, but as you level the Drink up, more Awoken Wine Worms will be needed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'A_Thousand_Days_Inebriation.md', within the main section titled 'A Thousand Days Inebriation'.
The content is as follows:
You can then use these special Crafting Materials to upgrade them at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove within Black Wind Mountain. Each upgrade will provide a sizeable buff to your healing potential and the unique effect, but as you level the Drink up, more Awoken Wine Worms will be needed.
